summary: This is an email chain from July 2019, forwarded within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, noting that attorneys Reid Weingarten and Marty Weinberg will be appearing on behalf of Jeffrey Epstein in court the following day. It indicates coordination within the prosecution team to obtain information from the 'Buffalo team'.

persons.name: Reid Weingarten
persons.context: Identified as appearing on behalf of Jeffrey Epstein in court the day after this email was sent.

persons.name: Marty Weinberg
persons.context: Identified as appearing alongside Reid Weingarten on behalf of Jeffrey Epstein in court the day after this email was sent.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The client whom attorneys Reid Weingarten and Marty Weinberg are representing in a legal proceeding.

connections.description: Weingarten is appearing as a defense attorney on behalf of Epstein.
Weinberg is appearing as a defense attorney on behalf of Epstein.
Both attorneys are appearing together on behalf of the same client, Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Epstein Court Appearance
events.description: Defense attorneys Reid Weingarten and Marty Weinberg are scheduled to appear on behalf of Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The email is dated July 8, 2019, and discusses legal representation for Jeffrey Epstein the following day.
High-profile defense attorneys Reid Weingarten and Marty Weinberg are representing Jeffrey Epstein.
The correspondence is internal to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, indicating prosecutorial awareness of Epstein's defense team.
The email mentions obtaining a 'download from the Buffalo team,' suggesting coordination between different offices within the U.S. Attorney's system regarding the Epstein case.
